roleset.name: (cause to) become warm
roleset.note: WARM-V NOTES: Frames file for 'warm' based on sentences in financial subcorpus andautomatic expansion via verbnet. (from warm.01-v predicate notes)
WARMING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, warm.01. Corresponds to VNcls other_cos-45.4. (from warming.01-n)

example.name: agentive
example.text: John warmed his buns in the toaster.

example.name: arg1
example.text: * insists that global warming is a gigantic hoax -LRB- yes , Rush Limbaugh knows more about global climate science than NASA ;
Another inconvenient fact for the man made global warming crowd . Since 1998 until today there has been no significant warming .

roleset.name: become receptive to
roleset.note: WARM-V NOTES: Frames file for 'warm' based on sentences in financial subcorpus andautomatic expansion via verbnet. (from warm.03-v predicate notes)

example.name: is it getting warm in here?
example.text: William Lynes, a retired engineer from Lockheed Corp., says he and his wife, Lily, warmed to the investment pitches of a penny-stock peddler from Stuart-James Co. in Atlanta after the broker told them he, too, had once worked with Lockheed.
example.arg: to the investment pitches of a penny-stock peddler from Stuart-James Co. in Atlanta
after the broker told them he, too, had once worked with Lockheed.

roleset.name: be socially welcoming, nice
roleset.note: WARM-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on cold-j.02 (from warm.02-j)

example.name: args 0, 2
example.text: Jessica was warm to her right off the bat.

roleset.name: (become) comfortably above average temperature
roleset.note: WARM-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5, warm-v.01, cold-j.01. (from warm.01-j)
WARMER-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from warmer.01-j)

role.descr: warm thing (not 'it', if refering to empty weather pronoun)

example.name: weather- don't tag 'it' as arg1, just like you wouldn't with 'raining'.
example.text: I 'm tired of seeing joggers in short sleeves and shirts in January . It 's not THAT warm .

roleset.name: (cause to) become warm
roleset.note: WARM_UP-V NOTES: VN class cooking-45.3. (from warm.02-v)

example.name: ergative
example.text: Try as he might, John just couldn't warm up after coming in from the storm.
example.arg: after coming in from the storm.

roleset.name: warm-up: become receptive to
roleset.note: WARM_UP-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from warm.05-v)

example.name: arg0
example.text: Good . Glad he is finally warming up . Now he will be crying for nana when we leave on Saturday .

example.name: adjectival
example.text: ``The branches are just warmed over, empty halls,'' says Mr. Konheim.
